job.title: Full Stack Software Developer
job.description:
Duration: Minimum Three Months Retainer Contract (with potential for a longer-term extension)

We are tech and consulting services company with clients in the EU, UK and USA. We are seeking a talented and experienced software developer to join our team on a retainer contract basis for a minimum period of three months. We wish to appoint an individual contractor and not a company/team.

As a pivotal member of our development team, you will be responsible for architecting and building robust web applications using .NET Core and ReactJS (TypeScript), as well as developing on our mobile application using .NET Core and React Native. This role requires experience with reporting technologies and familiarity with Laravel is an advantage , as our reporting tool is currently built on this platform.

Key Responsibilities:
•	Develop and maintain web applications using .NET Core and ReactJS (TypeScript)
•	Develop and maintain our mobile application using .NET Core and React Native
•	Manage AWS resources and infrastructure
•	Documentation including: Code Documentation; API Documentation; System Architecture Documentation; Version Control and Change Logs
•	Manage reporting tasks 

Requirements :
•	Proven experience in software development with expertise in: .NET Core, ReactJS (TypeScript) and React Native
•	Understanding of AWS and the ability to manage resources and infrastructure
•	Ability to commit a minimum of 8 hours a day, 5 days a week, with occasional additional hours compensated separately
•	Fluent in English with strong communication skills
•	Responsiveness to team requests and excellent teamwork skills
•	Proficiency in MS Office applications
•	Experience with Laravel is preferred but not essential
•	Prior work references are essential

Additional Information:
•	This position offers the opportunity for successful completion of the initial contract to potentially lead to an extended longer term position
•	Compensation will be commensurate with experience and skills

If you are a motivated and skilled software developer with a solid understanding of the above technologies and are looking to contribute to a dynamic team, we invite you to apply by 30 December 2023.

We appreciate your interest in joining our team and look forward to reviewing your application.

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a skilled Dot Net and React JS Web App Developer to join our team for a project lasting 3 to 6 months. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in web development, API integration, and have expertise in .NET Framework, ASP.NET, PHP, responsive design, and desktop application development.

Your responsibilities will include developing and maintaining web applications, integrating APIs, and ensuring high-quality code. You should be proficient in both front-end and back-end development, with a solid understanding of React JS.

To be considered for this role, please submit a proposal detailing how you can contribute to the project. Feel free to include links to your past completed projects showcasing your skills and expertise.

We look forward to reviewing your proposals and working with a talented developer who can help us successfully complete this project.
customFields.finalDescriptionAI:
We are seeking a skilled software developer to contribute to our team on a retainer contract basis for a minimum of three months. The role involves building web applications using Dot Net and React JS technologies. The position requires 8 hours a day, 5 days a week commitment, with occasional additional hours compensated separately.

The ideal candidate should possess fluency in English, be responsive to team requests, and demonstrate proficiency in MS Office applications, including MS Teams. Prior work references are essential. Successful completion of the initial contract may lead to an extended or permanent position.
customFields.inputsTitleAI: Dot Net and React JS Web App Developer Required
